metadata.title: For the Sake of His Sorrowful Passion
metadata.description: Prayer invoking mercy through Christ's Passion, from the Divine Mercy Chaplet
metadata.origin: Divine Mercy revelations to St. Faustina
metadata.usage: Recited on each Hail Mary bead in the Divine Mercy Chaplet

la.text: Per passionem Tuam sanctam, miserere nobis.

en.text: For the sake of His sorrowful Passion, have mercy on us and on the whole world.

es.text: Por su dolorosa Pasión, ten misericordia de nosotros y del mundo entero.

fr.text: Par sa douloureuse Passion, aie pitié de nous et du monde entier.

de.text: Um seiner schmerzhaften Passion willen, erbarme dich unser und der ganzen Welt.

it.text: Per la sua dolorosa Passione, abbi pietà di noi e del mondo intero.

pt.text: Pela Sua dolorosa Paixão, tende piedade de nós e do mundo inteiro.

pl.text: Dla Jego bolesnej Męki, zmiłuj się nad nami i nad całym światem.
